Gubernur Banten Ngeluh Iuran BPJS Kesehatan Naik Beratkan APBD
04 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Bahtiar Rifa'i


Foto: Gubernur Provinsi Banten Wahidin Halim. (Andhika-detikcom)

Serang - Gubernur Banten Wahidin Halim menilai kenaikan BPJS Kesehatan sebesar 100% mempengaruhi APBD Banten 2020. Akibat kenaikan tersebut, kabupaten dan kota di wilayahnya meminta bantuan penganggaran khususnya untuk warga dalam skema Penerima Bantuan Iuran (PBI). "Kenaikan ini cukup banyak, kabupaten, kota minta bantuan nggak mampu. Target mereka Rp 23 ribu sekarang Rp 42 ribu ada keluhan juga, minta bantuan dana dari kita, kita dana dari mana," kata Wahidin kepada wartawan di Kawasan Pusat Pemerintahan Provinsi Banten (KP3B), Serang, Senin (4/11/2019). Pada APBD 2019, ada hampir 1 juta orang menurutnya yang menerima bantuan iuran. Angka itu dikali Rp 23 ribu setiap bulannya dalam waktu setahun. Rencananya, pada APBD 2020, penerima bantuan iuran akan mengacu pada jumlah warga miskin di Banten sekitar 5,25% dari total penduduk atau sebanyak 668,740 jiwa. Penduduk ini menurutnya akan diprioritaskan sebagai penerima bantuan melalui kerja sama pemerintah pusat dan daerah. "Makanya kia coba ukur, masih kita diskusikan dengan dewan karena hitungan kita kalau tarif sekarang (bisa) Rp 600 miliar, besar banget," paparnya. Ini pun lanjut Wahidin belum termasuk dengan skema bantuan kesehatan dengan Surat Keterangan Tidak Mampu (SKTM). Karena, pada APBD sebelumnya, skema ini digunakan untuk warga yang belum tersentuh BPJS Kesehatan. Banten Governor Complains Health BPJS Contribution Increases Regional Budget
Nov 04 2019, 09:10 by Bahtiar Rifa'i


Photo: Governor of Banten Province Wahidin Halim. (Andhika-detikcom)

Serang - Banten Governor Wahidin Halim assessed that the increase in BPJS Health by 100% affected the Banten APBD 2020. As a result of the increase, districts and cities in their regions asked for budgeting assistance, especially for residents in the Contribution Beneficiary (PBI) scheme. "The increase is quite a lot, regencies, cities asking for help can not afford. Their target of Rp 23 thousand now Rp 42 thousand there are also complaints, asking for financial assistance from us, where are we funding from," Wahidin told reporters in the Central Government Region of Banten Province ( KP3B), Serang, Monday (11/04/2019). In 2019 APBD, according to him, there were almost 1 million people who received contribution assistance. That number is multiplied by Rp 23 thousand every month in a year. It is planned that in 2020 APBD, the recipient of contribution assistance will refer to the number of poor people in Banten around 5.25% of the total population or as many as 668,740 people. According to him, this population will be prioritized as beneficiaries through cooperation between the central and regional governments. "So, if we try to measure it, we will still discuss it with the council because our calculation is that the current tariff (of Rp. 600 billion) is huge," he explained. Wahidin continued that this was not included in the health assistance scheme with a Certificate of Disability (SKTM). Because, in the previous APBD, this scheme was used for residents who had not been touched by BPJS Health.
